name: Keep the memory Alive
description:
In KEEP THE MEMORY ALIVE you play a little creature inside a brain who is tasked to protect a precious memory from being forgotten. To keep the brain from forgetting the memory it has to be kept alive in at least 2 areas of the brain at the same time. Your goal is to get to the ripe old age of a hundred without forgetting this precious memory.

CONTROLS:
W, D - walk
LEFT MOUSE - shoot
SPACE - jump
E - heal a nearby memory (press multiple times)

You can use the minimap to transport to other areas of the brain.


I know this build is quite buggy and unfinished and I still want to add powerups, animation, tutorial etc. But I had some problems with getting a build done at all. So I'm happy I have at least something to show :)
